1.0.name: wordpress/tcvn-accordion-widget
1.0.description:
The TCVN Accordion Widget for WordPress is a good choice for showing serial content to bring more efficiency transferring information to readers. The plugin is built with flexible and power features such as loading other widget inside each item, theming supported, you can use this in difference purposes as the Question and Answer function, Showing your portfolios , contacting addresses … etc

Features:

  • Get title, image, description from post item.
  • Auto resize image with module size.
  • Customize User CSS formatting.
  • Allow loading wordpress widget inside post, page.
  • W3C XHTML 1.0 Transitional. W3C CSS Valid.
  • Tableless design and 100% CSS-based
  • Fully compatible IE7+, Firefox 2+, Flock 0.7+, Netscape, Safari, Opera 9.5
  • Literally unlimited transitions
  • Animated Layers
  • Easy installation
  • More than 40 preset transitions
